name: The TimeGuardian
description:
Developed by :

Muhammet Fatih DÖNMEZ

Saruhan Furkan ŞENTÜRK

The TimeGuardian is an open world, soulslike mobile purposed game which is created from imaginations of two developers. It is made as a school project. So it can be seen as a prototype but we think we can improve that in future and finish as a full game.

We used Unity Marketplace Assets and tried to make a beautiful experience sort of an open world game.

Thank you for trying it...
